inventory=[{"type": "nether_star", "quantity": 31, "index": 22}, {"type": "flower_pot", "quantity": 9, "index": 23}, {"type": "podzol", "quantity": 30, "index": 31}, {"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 3, "index": 38}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 16, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft chiseled_stone_bricks, I first need to craft stone_brick_slab. To do so, I will place stone_bricks at slot 1 in the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: The first step to crafting chiseled stone bricks is to place one stone brick slab on the crafting table. The stone brick slab is in slot 11, so I will move it to slot 1.

thought: The second step to crafting chiseled stone bricks is to place another stone brick slab next to the first one on the crafting table. The stone brick slab is in slot 11, so I will move it to slot 4.
Ok
